nodes.speaker: npc1
nodes.text: Welcome, traveler. I've been stuck in this Molten Cavern for what feels like an eternity.

nodes.speaker: npc1
nodes.text: I was exploring these caverns when I stumbled upon a hidden chamber. Unfortunately, the entrance collapsed behind me.

options.choice_text: That sounds terrifying. Can I help you find a way out?
You should have been more careful.

nodes.speaker: npc1
nodes.text: Actually, I think I found a possible exit. But it's blocked by a pile of rubble. If you could help me clear it, I'd be forever grateful.

options.choice_text: I'll help you clear the rubble.
I'm not interested in helping you.

nodes.speaker: npc1
nodes.text: Thank you so much for your help! With this rubble clearing tool, I should be able to make my way out of here.

options.choice_text: You're welcome. Be careful on your journey.

nodes.speaker: npc1
nodes.text: Be careful, traveler. The Lava Flow zone is just ahead, and it's not a place you want to get stuck in.

options.choice_text: I'll be fine. I've dealt with lava before.

nodes.speaker: npc1
nodes.text: Suit yourself, traveler. Just don't say I didn't warn you.

nodes.speaker: npc1
nodes.text: Fine, be that way. But don't come crying to me when you're stuck in this cavern forever.

nodes.speaker: npc1
nodes.text: May the road rise up to meet you, traveler. May your journey be safe and successful.

nodes.speaker: npc2
nodes.text: You dare to enter my domain, mortal?

options.choice_text: I mean no disrespect. I'm just passing through.
I'm here to challenge you, lava elemental!

nodes.speaker: npc2
nodes.text: Very well, mortal. I will let you pass... for now. But be warned: the Burnt Outcropping zone is treacherous, even for one such as myself.

options.choice_text: Thank you for your warning. I'll be careful.
I don't need your warnings. I can handle myself.

nodes.speaker: npc2
nodes.text: See that you are, mortal. The Burnt Outcropping is no place for the faint of heart.

options.choice_text: I'll keep that in mind. Thanks again for your warning.

nodes.speaker: npc2
nodes.text: May the flames guide you, mortal. May your journey be... enlightening.

nodes.speaker: npc2
nodes.text: Foolish mortal! You think you can challenge me? I will reduce you to ashes!

nodes.speaker: npc2
nodes.text: We'll see about that, mortal. You're no match for the power of the lava.

nodes.speaker: npc2
nodes.text: You are... formidable, mortal. But ultimately, no match for my power.

nodes.speaker: npc1
nodes.text: I've been thinking... maybe there's a way to escape this cavern after all.

options.choice_text: What did you have in mind?

nodes.speaker: npc1
nodes.text: I found an old map that seems to point to a hidden exit. But I'll need your help to decipher it.

nodes.speaker: npc1
nodes.text: Ah, I see! The map is pointing to a small crevice in the wall. If we can make our way through it, we might just find our way out.

nodes.speaker: npc1
nodes.text: We did it! We're finally out of this cavern!

nodes.speaker: npc2
nodes.text: Mortal, I sense that you are not like the others. You have a certain... spark within you.

nodes.speaker: npc2
nodes.text: I mean that you have the potential to wield the power of the lava. Would you like to learn more?

nodes.speaker: npc2
nodes.text: Very well, mortal. Let us begin your training. But be warned: the power of the lava is not to be trifled with.

nodes.speaker: npc2
nodes.text: Then let us begin. The power of the lava awaits you, mortal.

nodes.speaker: npc1
nodes.text: I've been thinking... maybe we can work together to escape this place.

options.choice_text: What did you have in mind?

nodes.speaker: npc1
nodes.text: I found a small key that might unlock a door in the Lava Flow zone. But I'll need your help to get there.

nodes.speaker: npc1
nodes.text: We did it! We're finally in the Lava Flow zone!

nodes.speaker: npc1
nodes.text: Now we need to find the door that the key unlocks. It should be around here somewhere.

nodes.speaker: npc1
nodes.text: Ah, there it is! The door is unlocked. Let's see what's on the other side.

nodes.speaker: npc2
nodes.text: Mortal, I sense that you are strong. But are you strong enough to defeat the challenges of the Burnt Outcropping?

nodes.speaker: npc2
nodes.text: Very well, mortal. Let us see how you fare against the challenges of the Burnt Outcropping.

nodes.speaker: npc2
nodes.text: Then let us begin. The challenges of the Burnt Outcropping await you, mortal.

nodes.speaker: npc2
nodes.text: The first challenge is to navigate the treacherous terrain of the Burnt Outcropping. Can you make it through?

nodes.speaker: npc2
nodes.text: Then let us see how you fare, mortal. The terrain of the Burnt Outcropping is unforgiving.

nodes.speaker: npc1
nodes.text: I've been thinking... maybe there's a way to make this cavern more habitable.

options.choice_text: What did you have in mind?

nodes.speaker: npc1
nodes.text: I found a small device that can purify the air in this cavern. But I'll need your help to activate it.

nodes.speaker: npc1
nodes.text: We did it! The air in this cavern is now breathable.

nodes.speaker: npc1
nodes.text: Now we can start to make this cavern more habitable. Let's see what other improvements we can make.

nodes.speaker: npc1
nodes.text: Then let us begin, mortal. The cavern awaits our improvements.

nodes.speaker: npc2
nodes.text: Mortal, I sense that you are curious. But are you curious enough to uncover the secrets of the Inferno Odyssey?

nodes.speaker: npc2
nodes.text: Very well, mortal. Let us see how you fare against the challenges of the Inferno Odyssey.

nodes.speaker: npc2
nodes.text: Then let us begin. The challenges of the Inferno Odyssey await you, mortal.

nodes.speaker: npc2
nodes.text: The first challenge is to navigate the treacherous terrain of the Molten Cavern. Can you make it through?

nodes.speaker: npc2
nodes.text: Then let us see how you fare, mortal. The terrain of the Molten Cavern is unforgiving.
